snippet: The 14th-ranked Spartans hit just one of their first eight shots, while Connecticut made 9 of its first 10, en route to giving Kevin Ollie a win in his first game as UConn’s head coach.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Connecticut defeats Michigan State, 66-62, in their first game under new coach Kevin Ollie; other men's and women's results noted.
lead_paragraph: The 14th-ranked Spartans hit just one of their first eight shots, while Connecticut made 9 of its first 10, en route to giving Kevin Ollie a win in his first game as UConn’s head coach.

headline.seo: UConn, Under New Coach, Upends No. 14 Michigan State
headline.main: Michigan St. Starts Slow, and UConn Capitalizes
headline.print_headline: Michigan St. Starts Slow, And UConn Capitalizes
